titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that Federal funding for elementary and secondary teacher training be used first for activities to advance science, mathematics, and engineering education for elementary and secondary teachers.

bill.summary: 7/13/1999--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that all local educational agencies receiving Federal funding for elementary and secondary teacher training or certification are encouraged to use such funding first for activities to advance science, mathematics, and engineering education for teachers.
